title: Matt Bomer hides sinister secret in first trailer for The Sinner 3
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Matt Bomer is hiding a dark secret in the new season of The Sinner – and may well have blood on his hands after a disastrous car crash changes his life forever.

In a first trailer for The Sinner 3, Matt’s character Jamie is seen shaken after a car wreck appears to leave someone dead, but Detective Ambrose (Bill Pullman) appears to believe it’s far from an accident.

A family man to the outside world, it’s clear Jamie is hiding something sinister, and his old college friend Nick (Chris Messina) looks intent to make his life hell because of it.

Hinting that there’s more to the suburban husband than is letting on, there’s a shared history with Nick and Jamie that is yet to be in college.

In one look, Jamie is seen telling Nick to leave his home, to which Nick bitterly responds: ‘You don’t get to tell me what to do…’

What is Matt’s character hiding? (Picture: ABC Network)

Something tells us this might be the darkest of the anthology series yet – which is saying something, considering last year’s addictive season had a 12-year-old kill his guardians and connected to a cult.

The Sinner Detective Ambrose affected by the bizarre and twisted murders that tap into the human psyche.

Previous seasons have seen Jessica Biel take the leading role after killing a perfect stranger in the middle of a busy public beach, and a young boy who killed both his parents.

According to the teaser for the series, what follows is ‘the most dangerous and disturbing case of his career’.

The Sinner Season 3 launches on Netflix in 2020.
